metadata.title: CVE-2018-16881 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability was found in rsyslog in the imptcpmodule. An attacker could send a specially crafted message to the imptcpsocket, which would cause rsyslog to crash. Versions before 8.27.0 arevulnerable.

criterions.comment: rsyslog: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
